mapper.sql: id, `name`, description, sort, merchant_id, attr_id, create_at, update_at, deleted
mapper.select:
select
from t_product_attr_value where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into t_product_attr_value (`name`, description, sort, merchant_id, attr_id, create_at, update_at, deleted) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
mapper.update: update t_product_attr_value set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_product_attr_value (`name`, description, sort, merchant_id, attr_id, create_at, update_at, deleted) values
(#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
mapper.select:
select
from t_product_attr_value where deleted = false AND attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sort
